review: I visited the clinic for pain in the shoulder and arm. Doctor didn’t hurry out the consultation and patiently listened to my issues. The prescribed treatment was very helpful and effective. I highly recommend Dr Rajneesh for Ortho related issues.

review: Good experience. He is great with diagnosis  n counseling  and gives ample time to explain the problem along with the solution. Does'nt misguide as was the case with my previous doctor , I consulted for the same problem. Would recommend him to others too.

review:
Awesome experience as always..it is difficult to find such a doctor who take the doctors profession seriously and do not treat only to grab money from patients.

He would ask you all the details and explain the reason for the treatment he is recommending..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I thing whatever feedback given by earlier are bang on as he is genuinely a great doctor. With such ease and confidence he helped us understand the issue was just impeccable. I would highly recommend him. Thanks doc really appreciate your genuine behaviour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother had pain in upper back & neck area since last 6 months & after consulting few local doctors there was not much improvement in the situation. One of my friend suggested of Dr. Rajnish & i found it to be a great experience.
He suggested some exercises & very few medicines. Within 2 months there was great improvement in the situation & now things are quite good as my mother is able to get up in the morning without any complaint otherwise it was very painful in the morning to getup.
The best part is that Dr. rajnish listened to our problem in detail & then gave his feedback & prescription.

review: Doctor’s overall temperament and demeanour was extremely odd. He only prescribed some pain killers *** *** *** ******* *** ****** ****** Not only was he unfriendly, he did not have the patience to listen to the patient’s concerns. His clinic was also empty…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Sethi for my mother - she has got a L5 Grade 1 listhesis. Dr Sethi has very patiently and carefully handled her in all of our discussions, answered all queries and explained things, and advised best possible options to explore. He is a thorough professional who is well versed with his subject and is blessed with extreme patience and soft tone to handle patients. I have also recommended him to few of my knowns and all have a good word to share for him.

tags: None
review: ********* ******* I found the doctor a-lot empathetic. He explained me the problem in detail, gave necessary consultation. What I like the most was, i was not put on unnecessary pain killers (which actually kills body). He prescribed various exercises, physio-therapies and hot fermentation. My 5 year old problem went within days. He also suggested the post treatment measures which helps me stay healthy. I ABSOLUTELY recommend this doctor.
